entries.do_not_edit: The English version of this file (refugee_biologist.stf) is automatically generated by the SwgConversationEditor.
entries.s_30: Please just get me out of here.
entries.s_32: Sorry, I've already given a statement to Imperial High Command about the virus accident. I have nothing further to add.
entries.s_33: The next flight is here, just get a ticket.
entries.s_34: I can't! Imperial High Command has summoned me to the Executor for yet another debriefing. I told them all I know. The virus somehow escaped. It was probably an accident.
entries.s_36: Everyone was dying! I ran away on foot before they turned into...whatever. Whatever it was going to be, it wasn't going to be a super soldier...more like a horror soldier.
